name: My Extreme Twitter
author: Aaryan Ahmed AL-Amin

sections.description:
This plugin will add an widget to use Twitter’s tweet.

Plugin Features

  • Twitter stream
  • Header enable/Disable
  • Theme selection
  • You have many option how you want to use your fan page like page.
  • Very Lightweight.
  • Easy to use
    & many More.
sections.installation:
• Upload myextremeTwitter.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract it.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  • Use widget “My Extreme Twitter” and Put your username
  • Now customize it.
sections.faq:
Will it slow down my website

My answer is no. It is very light weight.
sections.changelog:
2.1.1

  • Compability issue resolved.= 2.1.1 =
  • Screenshot added and Installation process updated.

2.0.2

  • 3.7.1 compatibile and Input fields style upgraded.
  • Anonymous username removed
